price: Òṣùpá náà, A ti ṣe òdíwọ̀n àwọn ibùsọ̀ fún un (tí ó ti ma máa tóbi sí i) títí ó máa fi padà dà bíi àran ọ̀pẹ tó ti pẹ́ (gbígbẹ).
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
